issue.title: [R] [CI] Re-enable DuckDB dev tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15970](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15970). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb/issues/3258 is resolved, we should re-enable the DuckDB dev branch tests that we disabled.

PR that disabled: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12666

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15970?focusedCommentId=17513704) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12740
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12740>
